title: Andrographis paniculata
Vernacular name: English- Creat </br> Hindi- Hara chirayata </br> Gujarati- kariyatu </br> Sanskrit- Kalamegha </br>
Therapeutic uses: used in cancer, diabetes, high blood pressure, ulcer, leprosy, bronchitis, skin diseases, flatulence, colic, influenza, dysentery, dyspepsia and malaria
